title: ANSIS Soil Domain Property Schema
description: JSON Schema definitions of the complete list of properties defined in the ANSIS Domain Ontology. These definitions are referenced by objects in feature/entity schema and may be referenced by multiple objects - i.e. the scope (domain) of a property is not restricted to a single object (entity).

agent.title: agent
agent.description: Agent of geomorphological or biotic activity.

ansisType.title: type
ansisType.$comment: Renamed ansisType to avoid conflict with JSON schema standard keyword.

aspect.title: aspect
aspect.description: Direction or azimuth that a terrain surface faces.

carbonateEffervescence.title: effervescence of carbonate
carbonateEffervescence.description: Effervescence of carbonate in fine earth.

classification.title: has classification
classification.description: Classification of the soil body or profile.

classificationFamilyGravel.title: classification - Gravel of the surface and A1 horizon
classificationFamilyGravel.description: Family criteria - Gravel of the surface and A1 horizon.

continuity.title: continuity
continuity.description: Continuity of linear or planar elements.

degree.title: degree or intensity
degree.description: Degree or severity or intensity of phenomenon.

density.title: density
density.description: Mass per unit volume of a substance.

depth.title: depth
depth.description: Depth from local surface of entity.

depthFreeWater.title: depth
depthFreeWater.description: Depth to free water at the site of soil observation, either above or below the soil surface, excluding litter and living vegetation. Positive values indicate water above the soil surface. Negative values indicate water below the soil surface.

depthGully.title: gully depth
depthGully.description: Depth from local surface to the base of the gully.

depthLower.title: lower depth
depthLower.description: depth from local surface to the base of the element

depthRHorizon.title: depth to R-Horizon
depthRHorizon.description: Depth from local surface to the top of the R-Horizon.

depthReason.title: reason for profile depth
depthReason.description: Reason for the specific depth of this profile e.g. length of auger, depth of interest, rock, too wet.

depthUpper.title: upper depth
depthUpper.description: Depth from local surface to the top of the element.

depthWidthRatio.title: depth width ratio
depthWidthRatio.description: Depth to width ratio of entity; ratio of depth to width of the element.

designSite.title: site design
designSite.description: Overall design of sampling at the site e.g. ASLS, grid, transect.

designSurvey.title: survey design
designSurvey.description: Overall design of soil or landscape survey e.g. free, grid, stratified, miscellaneous.

designation.title: horizon designation
designation.description: Designation of soil horizon with the sequence composing the Profile or Soil Body.

diameter.title: diameter
diameter.description: Thickness or width of round object.

duration.title: duration
duration.description: Temporal extent of event or phenomenon.

elevation.title: elevation
elevation.description: Elevation of element above a datum (usually MSL).

frequency.title: frequency
frequency.description: Temporal frequency of event or phenomenon.

grade.title: grade
grade.description: Grade or degree of development of structure.

grainSize.title: grain size
grainSize.description: Size of the most common particles of a material.

hasMicrorelief.title: has microrelief
hasMicrorelief.description: A description of microrelief at the site.

hasMicrorelief_biotic.title: has microrelief - biotic
hasMicrorelief_biotic.description: A description of biotic microrelief at the site.

hasMicrorelief_gilgai.title: has microrelief - gilgai
hasMicrorelief_gilgai.description: A description of gilgai microrelief at the site.

hasMicrorelief_hummocky.title: has microrelief - hummocky
hasMicrorelief_hummocky.description: A description of hummocky microrelief at the site.

hasMicrorelief_other.title: has microrelief - other
hasMicrorelief_other.description: A description of other microrelief at the site.

hasMottles.title: has mottles
hasMottles.description: A description of mottles and other colour patterns.

hasOutcrop.title: has outcrop
hasOutcrop.description: A description of rock outcrop at this entity.

hasStreamChannel.title: has stream channel
hasStreamChannel.description: A description of stream channel occurrence.

locationInToposequence.title: location in toposequence
locationInToposequence.$comment: No defined vocabulary. Landform vocabularies are incomplete.

mapSheet.title: mapSheet
mapSheet.description: Map sheet on which this location is found.

material.title: material
material.description: Material or composition of entity or element.

moistureStatus.title: moisture status
moistureStatus.description: Moisture state of material while property evaluation is carried out.

ansisPattern.title: pattern
ansisPattern.description: Spatial pattern of channels or other linear element.

permeability.title: permeability
permeability.description: Rate of flow of liquid through the material.

physical.title: soil physical property
physical.$comment: No definition of property or expected data types.

plasticity.title: plasticity
plasticity.description: Capability of being formed or molded.

porosity.title: porosity
porosity.description: Proportion of void space in material.

purpose.title: purpose
purpose.description: Purpose of or reason for activity.

relatedActivity.title: related activity
relatedActivity.description: Link to an activity related to this context.

relatedHorizon.title: related soil horizon
relatedHorizon.description: Related soil horizon within a soil body or sample, or associated with a contact.

relatedLandSurveySite.title: related land survey site
relatedLandSurveySite.description: Link to a land survey site related to this context.

relatedLayer.title: related soil layer
relatedLayer.description: Related soil layer within a soil body or profile.

relatedProfile.title: Related Profile
relatedProfile.description: Link to a soil profile related to this context.

relatedProject.title: related project
relatedProject.description: Link to project that supported this activity.

relatedSample.title: related sample
relatedSample.description: Link to a sample related to this context.

relatedSite.title: related site
relatedSite.description: Link to a soil site related to this context.

relatedSoilBody.title: related soil body
relatedSoilBody.description: Link to a soil body related to this context.

relief.title: relief
relief.description: Amount of vertical variation of the landform.

shape.title: shape
shape.description: Geometry of entity or entity boundary - in the context of a soil horizon, this refers to the shape of the lower boundary.

size.title: size
size.description: Geometric scale and extent of element.

structure.title: structure
structure.description: internal arrangement of elements of the material or entity.

texture.title: texture
texture.description: material (organic or mineral) texture, in terms of particle size distribution and component materials

underlyingMaterial.title: underlying material
underlyingMaterial.description: Lithology of material underlying the landform.

visitor.title: visitor
visitor.description: Site visitor, for the purpose of sampling or observation.
